com.floreysoft.jmte
Interface ErrorHandler

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractErrorHandler, DefaultErrorHandler, InternalErrorHandler, ProductionErrorHandler
public interface ErrorHandler

Interface used to handle errors while expanding a template.

Method Summary
 void error(String messageKey, com.floreysoft.jmte.token.Token token)
          Handles an error while interpreting a template in an appropriate way.
 void error(String messageKey, com.floreysoft.jmte.token.Token token, Map<String,Object> parameters)
          Handles an error while interpreting a template in an appropriate way.
 

Method Detail

error

void error(String messageKey,
           com.floreysoft.jmte.token.Token token,
           Map<String,Object> parameters)
           throws ParseException
Handles an error while interpreting a template in an appropriate way. This might contain logging the error or even throwing an exception.

Parameters:
messageKey - key for the error message
token - the token this error occurred on
parameters - additional parameters to be filled into message or null if you do not have additional parameters
Throws:
ParseException

           com.floreysoft.jmte.token.Token token)
           throws ParseException
Handles an error while interpreting a template in an appropriate way. This might contain logging the error or even throwing an exception.

Parameters:
messageKey - key for the error message
token - the token this error occurred on
Throws:
ParseException
